meta.title: Axl - Your AI Gaming Companion
meta.description: Axl brings AI-powered commentary to your gaming sessions on Discord. Download now for Windows.

hero.title: Meet Axl!
hero.subtitle: Your AI-powered gaming companion for Discord. Bringing the commentary, laughs, and good vibes to your gaming sessions.
hero.roast: Oh, and I'll totally roast your gameplay too. Someone's gotta keep you humble.

tooltip.title: Hey! Quick heads up:
tooltip.message: Since I'm an indie dev, Microsoft SmartScreen doesn't recognize me yet. Just click "More Info" and then "Run anyway" to get past the warning.
tooltip.footer: The more people download, the more Microsoft will trust us. Sorry for the hassle!

persona.note: Can't stand Axl? No worries! There are other companions available, and you can even create your own!

footer.disclaimer: Axl uses AI to chat and hang out in your Discord voice channels, and AI-generated profile pictures too.
